Package com.datastax.astra.sdk.databases

Class DatabasesClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.astra.sdk.databases.DatabasesClient
  • public class DatabasesClient
extends Object
    Client for the Astra Devops API. The JDK11 client http is used and as such jdk11+ is required https://docs.datastax.com/en/astra/docs/_attachments/devopsv1.html
    Author:
    Cedrick LUNVEN (@clunven)
